articles.title: DHS Secretary Noem says entire southern border wall will be painted black to stop people from climbing it - CBS News
articles.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem says the entire southern border wall with Mexico is being painted black to deter illegal immigration, at President Trump's request.

articles.title: Hurricane Erin triggers storm alerts in N.C., Virginia as some East Coast beaches shut - Axios
articles.description: North Carolina's governor declared an emergency and 2 N.C. counties are under evacuation orders due to the storm's threats.

articles.title: Trump Embarks on $104 Million Bond-Buying Spree While in Office - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: President Donald Trump has bought hundreds of bonds since he returned to office, including those sold by US companies affected by the sweeping changes to federal policies he’s championed.

articles.title: Anthony Richardson’s camp has stern message for Colts after Daniel Jones wins starting QB job - New York Post
articles.description: The Colts’ Daniel Jones decision isn’t going over well with Anthony Richardson’s camp.

articles.title: Gov. Bob Ferguson to U.S. AG Pam Bondi: WA won’t ‘bend the knee’ to Trump regime - The Olympian
articles.description: Washington's Gov. Ferguson rebukes demands from U.S. AG Pam Bondi to drop sanctuary policies, defending the state's Keep Washington Working Act amid pressure.

articles.title: 'Lilo & Stitch' Actor David Hekili Kenui Bell Cause of Death Revealed - TMZ
articles.description: David Hekili Kenui Bell's autopsy report has been released, painting a clearer and heartbreaking picture of what happened before his sudden death at just 46 years old.

articles.title: RFK Jr. attacks pediatricians’ group over vaccine recommendations - Politico
articles.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics had earlier urged parents to get young children vaccinated against Covid — pushing back against the health secretary’s stance.

articles.title: Walmart recalls shrimp after FDA warns of radioactive isotopes - BBC
articles.description: Consumers in 13 states are being advised to throw away shrimp with the label Great Value.

articles.title: Trump and Putin are both criticizing mail-in voting. Election officials are freaking out. - Politico
articles.description: Officials are concerned that Trump’s moves to loosen U.S. election security may provide an opening for Russia.

articles.description: The Trump administration says it's revoking the security clearances of 37 current and former national security officials. It's the latest act of retribution targeting public servants in the federal government’s intelligence community. A memo posted Tuesday by…

articles.title: Trump expands 'woke' criticism from Smithsonian to other museums - NPR
articles.description: "The Museums throughout Washington, but all over the Country are, essentially, the last remaining segment of "WOKE," he wrote.

articles.title: House Republican calls for ‘action’ from Johnson to end redistricting - The Hill

articles.title: What’s next for Ukraine-Russia peace talks? 5 questions to ask heading into a potential trilateral - Politico
articles.description: Trump declared on Monday that he was arranging a trilateral meeting between Zelenskyy and Putin.

articles.title: Last-minute Pixel 10 leak suggests controversial change is really happening - Android Authority
articles.description: On the eve of launch, a Pixel 10 leak backs up claims that Google could be moving away from physical SIM cards.

articles.title: PGA Tour stamps its signature on more big-money events in congested 2026 schedule - NBC Sports
articles.description: Instead of trying to concoct a new way to mandate participation in top events, the Tour would be better served by focusing on building a better schedule.
